game.title: Retrieve the Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the lost artifact hidden in the ancient ruins.
game.description: Centuries ago, a powerful artifact was lost in the deep and dangerous ancient ruins. Legends say that whoever possesses this artifact can obtain incredible power. Your quest is to find and retrieve this artifact before it falls into the wrong hands. Be prepared for treacherous traps, fierce guardians, and puzzles that will challenge your wit and agility. Are you ready for this perilous expedition?
game.reward: A piece of the artifact which grants a special ability, and a significant amount of experience points.

tasks.objective: Locate the entrance to the ancient ruins
tasks.description: Use the ancient map to navigate your way to the hidden entrance of the ancient ruins. Beware of the traps set by the previous explorer.

tasks.objective: Solve the riddle of the first chamber
tasks.description: Upon entering the ruins, you will encounter a chamber with a mysterious riddle. Solve the riddle correctly to proceed further.
Deep within the ruins, you will face ancient guardians protecting the artifact. Prepare for a fierce battle against these powerful enemies.
The artifact is hidden deep within the inner chamber of the ruins. Be cautious, as the artifact's power has awakened other creatures lurking in the darkness.
